rounds.category: THE DAYS OF GUNS N' ROSES

clues.text: Guns N' Roses hit No. 1 in September 1988 with this "sweet" hit featuring Slash's tasty guitar licks

rounds.text: In a British novel this young character's last words are, "Which is better--to have rules & agree, or to hunt & kill?"
